tweet: After watching numerous projects build with both @celernetwork and Chainlink, we decided to take it one step further: a strategic partnership with Celer that introduces the capability to combine real-world information and layer-2 scalability!  https://t.co/bEUuX9Nvky

Celer and Chainlink @chainlink are pleased to reveal a strategic partnership today! 🎉🎉The partnership bridges smart contracts with off-chain resources and represents the FIRST attempt to integrate real-world information with a layer-2 scaling platform.  https://t.co/njeRHMSvM3

This Celer partnership is quite big because it gives Chainlink an end to end smart contract solution independent of eth gas costs and scalability by taking it off-chain. Use cases are going to come soon regardless of the state of ETH. Don't sleep on this news.
